items.name: Adrenaline Shot
items.description: A serum that fully restores stamina and temporarily increases stamina regeneration

items.name: Advanced ARC Powercell
items.description: Very valuable resource that drops from certain ARC enemies

items.name: Advanced Electrical Components
items.description: Used to craft utility items and shield mods. Can be recycled into crafting materials. Used to craft: Raider Hatch Key, Photoelectric Cloak

items.name: Advanced Electrical Components Blueprint
items.description: Lets you craft an Advanced Electrical Component

items.name: Advanced Mechanical Components
items.description: Mostly used to craft advanced weapons. Can be recycled into crafting materials.

items.name: Advanced Mechanical Components Blueprint
items.description: Lets you craft an Advanced Mechanical Components

items.name: Agave
items.description: A piece of an agave leaf. Can be used to regain a small amount of health.

items.name: Agave Juice
items.description: A concoction that temporarily increases stamina regeneration, at a small initial cost to health.

items.name: Air Freshener
items.description: May be worth a few coins.

items.name: Alarm Clock
items.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

items.name: Angled Grip I
items.description: Slightly reduces horizontal recoil.
items.flavorText: Compatible with Ferro, Kettle, Rattler, Stitcher, Arpeggio, Il Toro, Venator, Bobcat, Tempest, Vulcano

items.name: Angled Grip II
items.description: Moderately reduces horizontal recoil.
items.flavorText: Compatible with: Ferro, Kettle, Rattler, Stitcher, Arpeggio, Il Toro, Venator, Bobcat, Tempest, Vulcano

items.name: Angled Grip II Blueprint
items.description: Lets you craft an Angled Grip II

items.name: Angled Grip III
items.description: Significantly reduces horizontal recoil.
items.flavorText: Compatible with: Ferro, Kettle, Rattler, Stitcher, Arpeggio, Il Toro, Venator, Bobcat, Tempest, Vulcano

items.name: Angled Grip III Blueprint
items.description: Lets you craft an Angled Grip III

items.name: Antiseptic
items.description: Used to craft medical supplies. Can be recycled into chemicals.

items.name: Anvil Blueprint
items.description: Lets you craft an Anvil - Has high damage output and headshot damage, but slow handling.

items.name: Anvil I
items.description: Single-action hand cannon with high damage output and headshot damage, but slow handling.
items.flavorText: Very effective against ARC armor plating.

items.name: Anvil II
items.description: Single-action hand cannon with high damage output and headshot damage, but slow handling.
items.flavorText: Very effective against ARC armor plating.

items.name: Anvil III
items.description: Single-action hand cannon with high damage output and headshot damage, but slow handling.
items.flavorText: Very effective against ARC armor plating

items.name: Anvil IV
items.description: Single-action hand cannon with high damage output and headshot damage, but slow handling.

items.name: Anvil Splitter
items.description: Compatible with: Anvil  - Tech mod for the Anvil that replaces its bullets with ones that split into 4 weaker projectiles.
items.flavorText: 70% Reduced Projectile Damage & +3 Projectiles Per Shot

items.name: Anvil Splitter Blueprint
items.description: Lets you craft an Anvil Splitter

items.name: Aphelion Rifle Blueprint
items.description: Lets you craft an Aphelion Rifle

items.name: Apricot
items.description: A sun ripe apricot. Can be consumed for a small amount of stamina.

items.name: ARC Alloy
items.description: Obtained from ARC enemies or activities, or by recycling certain ARC parts. Used to craft components.

items.name: ARC Circuitry
items.description: Obtained from ARC enemies or activities. Used to craft components. Can be recycled into ARC Alloy.

items.name: ARC Circuitry Blueprint
items.description: Lets you craft an ARC Circuitry

items.name: ARC Coolant
items.description: Obtained from ARC enemies or activities. Can be recycled into chemicals

items.name: ARC Flex Rubber
items.description: Obtained from ARC enemies or activities. Can be recycled into rubber.

items.name: ARC Motion Core
items.description: Obtained from ARC enemies or activities. Used to craft components. Can be recycled into ARC Alloy.

items.name: ARC Performance Steel
items.description: Obtained from ARC enemies or activities. Can be recycled into scrap metal.

items.name: ARC Powercell
items.description: Valuable resource that drops from all ARC enemies. Used to craft: Shield Recharger

items.name: ARC Synthetic Resin
items.description: Obtained from ARC enemies or activities. Can be recycled into plastic.

items.name: ARC Thermo Lining
items.description: Obtained from ARC enemies and activities. Can be recycled into fabric.

items.name: Arpeggio I
items.description: Has decent damage output and accuracy.
items.flavorText: Somewhat effective against ARC armor plating

items.name: Arpeggio II
items.description: A 3-round burst assault rifle with decent damage output and accuracy.
items.flavorText: Somewhat effective against ARC armor plating

items.name: Arpeggio III
items.description: A 3-round burst assault rifle with decent damage output and accuracy.

items.name: Arpeggio IV
items.description: A 3-round burst assault rifle with decent damage output and accuracy.

items.name: Assorted Seeds
items.description: A handful of seeds. Celeste might be looking for these.

items.name: Aviator (Outfit)
items.description: Aviator outfit is a quest reward from Armored Transports.

items.name: Bag (Radio Renegade Variant)
items.description: Radio Renegade Bag Variant - Unlock by completing Power Out Quest.

items.name: Banana (Backpack Charm)
items.description: Banana backpack charm from Medical Merchandise quest.

items.name: Bandage
items.description: A medical item that gradually restores health over time.

items.name: Barricade Kit
items.description: A deployable cover that can block incoming damage until it breaks.

items.name: Barricade Kit Blueprint
items.description: Lets you craft a Barricade Kit

items.name: Bastion Cell
items.description: A salvaged component from a Bastion unit. Can be recycled into crafting materials.

items.name: Battery
items.description: Used to craft medical supplies. Can be recycled into scrap metal.

items.name: Bettina Blueprint
items.description: Has slow fire rate and high damage output.
